attributes.action: make Britain the 51st State of America and not part of a Federalised Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we are not careful we will become part of a Federalised Europe and whilst I have nothing against Euorpeans, I believe we would be better off as the 51st State of America.  Europe will bleed us dry, both monetarily and of our resources.

rejection.details: This is rejected not on the grounds of humour, but it 'has no point about government policy'.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
